channel.title: .NET Technology Show
channel.description: Backstage pass to all things ServiceStack & .NET
channel.itunes:author: ServiceStack
channel.itunes:subtitle: Backstage pass to all things ServiceStack & .NET
channel.itunes:summary: In this show, we explore the inner workings that goes into each ServiceStack Release and explore the benefits and purpose behind major features and how they can empower your next project and help you build better apps faster. We also dive deep into some of the most popular topics in modern web dev, API design, microservices architecture, and more.

item.title: Background Jobs
item.description: Taking a deep dive into Background Jobs, a new library for .NET 8 Apps for simplifying task scheduling and management
item.itunes:summary: Taking a deep dive into Background Jobs, a new library for .NET 8 Apps for simplifying task scheduling and management

item.title: ServiceStack v8.4 Release
item.description: The latest features and improvements in ServiceStack v8.4 covering Background Jobs, SQLite Request Logs, Scalable SQLite Apps and more!
item.itunes:summary: The latest features and improvements in ServiceStack v8.4 covering Background Jobs, SQLite Request Logs, Scalable SQLite Apps and more!

item.title: ServiceStack v8.3 Release
item.description: The latest features and improvements in ServiceStack v8.3 covering Commands Feature, API Keys, Integrated Admin UIs and more!
item.itunes:summary: The latest features and improvements in ServiceStack v8.3 covering Commands Feature, API Keys, Integrated Admin UIs and more!

item.title: ServiceStack v8.2 Release
item.description: All about ServiceStack v8.2 Release new Vue & React Vite SPA Tailwind Markdown powered Templates, integrated Identity Auth, new Kotlin Compose Multiplatform template and new Vite Press Plugin
item.itunes:summary: All about ServiceStack v8.2 Release new Vue & React Vite SPA Tailwind Markdown powered Templates, integrated Identity Auth, new Kotlin Compose Multiplatform template and new Vite Press Plugin

item.title: ServiceStack v8.1 Release
item.description: ServiceStack v8.1 is here with a host of new features including full integration with Identity Auth, ASP .NET IOC, Endpoint Routing, System.Text.Json APIs, enhanced Admin UIs with JWT support, and much more!
item.itunes:summary: ServiceStack v8.1 is here with a host of new features including full integration with Identity Auth, ASP .NET IOC, Endpoint Routing, System.Text.Json APIs, enhanced Admin UIs with JWT support, and much more!

item.title: ServiceStack v8.0 Release
item.description: ServiceStack v8 is here with all packages now including .net8.0 builds, all Project Templates upgraded to .NET 8, GitHub Actions now using .NET 8 Docker containers, new Tailwind Blazor, Razor Pages & MVC Templates now using ASP .NET Identity Auth & EF
item.itunes:summary: ServiceStack v8 is here with all packages now including .net8.0 builds, all Project Templates upgraded to .NET 8, GitHub Actions now using .NET 8 Docker containers, new Tailwind Blazor, Razor Pages & MVC Templates now using ASP .NET Identity Auth & EF
